Symbol.Script_3D:
!-----------3d--------------------- if show_el < EPS then end IF gs_detlevel_3D_m < EPS THEN END CALL "MEP_m_RequestSystemGlobals" PARAMETERS ALL one_ConID=0 returned_parameters gs_cont_pen, sMat, gs_InsMat, MEP_cline_pen, show_el
! ============================================================================== ! Multi-Basin Counter ! ==============================================================================
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END
addStatus59 = 0 IF GLOB_CONTEXT > 40 AND GLOB_CONTEXT < 50 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m=1 addStatus59 = 59 ENDIF
unID=1
if not(gs_shadow) then SHADOW OFF
pen gs_cont_pen
! ============================================================================== ! MEP ! ==============================================================================
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m=1 OR gs_detlevel_3D_m=3 THEN RESOL 8 IF gs_detlevel_3D_m=2 THEN RESOL 24
if bShowMEP then
IF useSysMat THEN count_mat = sMat bs_mat = sMat gs_sink_mat = sMat gs_tap_mat = sMat gs_drain_mat = sMat gs_con_mat = sMat ENDIF
! --- CONNECTIONS to Basin #1 --- !
add -A/2 + sinkDistL + sink_width/2 + sinkPos[1][1], 0, h_top
if bWallmountedTap then corrMEPx = tapPos[1][1] corrMEPz = tapPos[1][3] + tapHeight - h_top + count_th
add corrMEPx, 0, corrMEPz else corrMEPx = 0 corrMEPz = 0 endif
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsACL_4" parameters SetProgram = SetProgram, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = gs_con_mat, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 15, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2=ConPosZ_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = 15, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3 - corrMEPx, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConPosZ_3=ConPosZ_3 - corrMEPz, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConEdit_3 = 1, ConShow_4 = 0, ConHotspotShow_4 = 0, ConShow_5 = 0, ConHotspotShow_5 = 0, ConShow_6 = 0, ConHotspotShow_6 = 0, ConShow_7 = 0, ConHotspotShow_7 = 0, ConShow_8 = 0, ConHotspotShow_8 = 0, ConShow_9 = 0, ConHotspotShow_9 = 0, ConShow_10 = 0, ConHotspotShow_10 = 0, ConShow_11 = 0, ConHotspotShow_11 = 0, ConShow_12 = 0, ConHotspotShow_12 = 0, ConShow_13 = 0, ConHotspotShow_13 = 0, ConShow_14 = 0, ConHotspotShow_14 = 0, ConShow_15 = 0, ConHotspotShow_15 = 0, ConShow_16 = 0, ConHotspotShow_16 = 0, ConShow_17 = 0, ConHotspotShow_17 = 0, ConShow_18 = 0, ConHotspotShow_18 = 0, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData
if bWallmountedTap then del 1 del 1
! --- CONNECTIONS to Basin #2 --- !
if nSink > 1 then add -A/2 + sinkDistL + sink_width*1.5 + sinkSpacing + sinkPos[2][1], 0, h_top
if bWallmountedTap then corrMEPx = tapPos[2][1] corrMEPz = tapPos[2][3] + tapHeight - h_top + count_th
add corrMEPx, 0, corrMEPz else corrMEPx = 0 corrMEPz = 0 endif
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsACL_4" parameters SetProgram = SetProgram, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = gs_con_mat, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConShow_1 = 0, ConHotspotShow_1 = 0, ConShow_2 = 0, ConHotspotShow_2 = 0, ConShow_3 = 0, ConHotspotShow_3 = 0, ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4, ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4, ConPosZ_4=ConPosZ_4, ConLength_4=ConLength_4, ConEdit_4 = 15, ConPosX_5=ConPosX_5, ConPosY_5=ConPosY_5, ConPosZ_5=ConPosZ_5, ConLength_5=ConLength_5, ConEdit_5 = 15, ConPosX_6=ConPosX_6-corrMEPx, ConPosY_6=ConPosY_6, ConPosZ_6=ConPosZ_6-corrMEPz, ConLength_6=ConLength_6, ConEdit_6 = 1, ConShow_7 = 0, ConHotspotShow_7 = 0, ConShow_8 = 0, ConHotspotShow_8 = 0, ConShow_9 = 0, ConHotspotShow_9 = 0, ConShow_10 = 0, ConHotspotShow_10 = 0, ConShow_11 = 0, ConHotspotShow_11 = 0, ConShow_12 = 0, ConHotspotShow_12 = 0, ConShow_13 = 0, ConHotspotShow_13 = 0, ConShow_14 = 0, ConHotspotShow_14 = 0, ConShow_15 = 0, ConHotspotShow_15 = 0, ConShow_16 = 0, ConHotspotShow_16 = 0, ConShow_17 = 0, ConHotspotShow_17 = 0, ConShow_18 = 0, ConHotspotShow_18 = 0, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData
if bWallmountedTap then del 1
del 1 endif

if nSink > 2 then add -A/2 + sinkDistL + sink_width*2.5 + sinkSpacing*2 + sinkPos[3][1], 0, h_top
if bWallmountedTap then corrMEPx = tapPos[3][1] corrMEPz = tapPos[3][3] + tapHeight - h_top + count_th
add corrMEPx, 0, corrMEPz else corrMEPx = 0 corrMEPz = 0 endif
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsACL_4" parameters SetProgram = SetProgram, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = gs_con_mat, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConShow_1 = 0, ConHotspotShow_1 = 0, ConShow_2 = 0, ConHotspotShow_2 = 0, ConShow_3 = 0, ConHotspotShow_3 = 0, ConShow_4 = 0, ConHotspotShow_4 = 0, ConShow_5 = 0, ConHotspotShow_5 = 0, ConShow_6 = 0, ConHotspotShow_6 = 0, ConPosX_7=ConPosX_7, ConPosY_7=ConPosY_7, ConPosZ_7=ConPosZ_7, ConLength_7=ConLength_7, ConEdit_7 = 15, ConPosX_8=ConPosX_8, ConPosY_8=ConPosY_8, ConPosZ_8=ConPosZ_8, ConLength_8=ConLength_8, ConEdit_8 = 15, ConPosX_9=ConPosX_9-corrMEPx, ConPosY_9=ConPosY_9, ConPosZ_9=ConPosZ_9-corrMEPz, ConLength_9=ConLength_9, ConEdit_9 = 1, ConShow_10 = 0, ConHotspotShow_10 = 0, ConShow_11 = 0, ConHotspotShow_11 = 0, ConShow_12 = 0, ConHotspotShow_12 = 0, ConShow_13 = 0, ConHotspotShow_13 = 0, ConShow_14 = 0, ConHotspotShow_14 = 0, ConShow_15 = 0, ConHotspotShow_15 = 0, ConShow_16 = 0, ConHotspotShow_16 = 0, ConShow_17 = 0, ConHotspotShow_17 = 0, ConShow_18 = 0, ConHotspotShow_18 = 0, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData
if bWallmountedTap then del 1
del 1 endif
! --- CONNECTIONS to Basin #4 --- !
if nSink > 3 then add -A/2 + sinkDistL + sink_width*3.5 + sinkSpacing*3 + sinkPos[4][1], 0, h_top
if bWallmountedTap then corrMEPx = tapPos[4][1] corrMEPz = tapPos[4][3] + tapHeight - h_top + count_th
add corrMEPx, 0, corrMEPz else corrMEPx = 0 corrMEPz = 0 endif
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsACL_4" parameters SetProgram = SetProgram, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = gs_con_mat, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConShow_1 = 0, ConHotspotShow_1 = 0, ConShow_2 = 0, ConHotspotShow_2 = 0, ConShow_3 = 0, ConHotspotShow_3 = 0, ConShow_4 = 0, ConHotspotShow_4 = 0, ConShow_5 = 0, ConHotspotShow_5 = 0, ConShow_6 = 0, ConHotspotShow_6 = 0, ConShow_7 = 0, ConHotspotShow_7 = 0, ConShow_8 = 0, ConHotspotShow_8 = 0, ConShow_9 = 0, ConHotspotShow_9 = 0, ConPosX_10=ConPosX_10, ConPosY_10=ConPosY_10, ConPosZ_10=ConPosZ_10, ConLength_10=ConLength_10, ConEdit_10 = 15, ConPosX_11=ConPosX_11, ConPosY_11=ConPosY_11, ConPosZ_11=ConPosZ_11, ConLength_11=ConLength_11, ConEdit_11 = 15, ConPosX_12=ConPosX_12-corrMEPx, ConPosY_12=ConPosY_12, ConPosZ_12=ConPosZ_12-corrMEPz, ConLength_12=ConLength_12, ConEdit_12 = 1, ConShow_13 = 0, ConHotspotShow_13 = 0, ConShow_14 = 0, ConHotspotShow_14 = 0, ConShow_15 = 0, ConHotspotShow_15 = 0, ConShow_16 = 0, ConHotspotShow_16 = 0, ConShow_17 = 0, ConHotspotShow_17 = 0, ConShow_18 = 0, ConHotspotShow_18 = 0, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData
if bWallmountedTap then del 1
del 1 endif
! --- CONNECTIONS to Basin #5 --- !
if nSink > 4 then add -A/2 + sinkDistL + sink_width*4.5 + sinkSpacing*4 + sinkPos[5][1], 0, h_top
if bWallmountedTap then corrMEPx = tapPos[5][1] corrMEPz = tapPos[5][3] + tapHeight - h_top + count_th
add corrMEPx, 0, corrMEPz else corrMEPx = 0 corrMEPz = 0 endif
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsACL_4" parameters SetProgram = SetProgram, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = gs_con_mat, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConShow_1 = 0, ConHotspotShow_1 = 0, ConShow_2 = 0, ConHotspotShow_2 = 0, ConShow_3 = 0, ConHotspotShow_3 = 0, ConShow_4 = 0, ConHotspotShow_4 = 0, ConShow_5 = 0, ConHotspotShow_5 = 0, ConShow_6 = 0, ConHotspotShow_6 = 0, ConShow_7 = 0, ConHotspotShow_7 = 0, ConShow_8 = 0, ConHotspotShow_8 = 0, ConShow_9 = 0, ConHotspotShow_9 = 0, ConShow_10 = 0, ConHotspotShow_10 = 0, ConShow_11 = 0, ConHotspotShow_11 = 0, ConShow_12 = 0, ConHotspotShow_12 = 0, ConPosX_13=ConPosX_13, ConPosY_13=ConPosY_13, ConPosZ_13=ConPosZ_13, ConLength_13=ConLength_13, ConEdit_13 = 15, ConPosX_14=ConPosX_14, ConPosY_14=ConPosY_14, ConPosZ_14=ConPosZ_14, ConLength_14=ConLength_14, ConEdit_14 = 15, ConPosX_15=ConPosX_15-corrMEPx, ConPosY_15=ConPosY_15, ConPosZ_15=ConPosZ_15-corrMEPz, ConLength_15=ConLength_15, ConEdit_15 = 1, ConShow_16 = 0, ConHotspotShow_16 = 0, ConShow_17 = 0, ConHotspotShow_17 = 0, ConShow_18 = 0, ConHotspotShow_18 = 0, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData
if bWallmountedTap then del 1
del 1 endif
! --- CONNECTIONS to Basin #6 --- !
if nSink > 5 then add -A/2 + sinkDistL + sink_width*5.5 + sinkSpacing*5 + sinkPos[6][1], 0, h_top
if bWallmountedTap then corrMEPx = tapPos[6][1] corrMEPz = tapPos[6][3] + tapHeight - h_top + count_th
add corrMEPx, 0, corrMEPz else corrMEPx = 0 corrMEPz = 0 endif
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsACL_4" parameters SetProgram = SetProgram, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = gs_con_mat, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConShow_1 = 0, ConHotspotShow_1 = 0, ConShow_2 = 0, ConHotspotShow_2 = 0, ConShow_3 = 0, ConHotspotShow_3 = 0, ConShow_4 = 0, ConHotspotShow_4 = 0, ConShow_5 = 0, ConHotspotShow_5 = 0, ConShow_6 = 0, ConHotspotShow_6 = 0, ConShow_7 = 0, ConHotspotShow_7 = 0, ConShow_8 = 0, ConHotspotShow_8 = 0, ConShow_9 = 0, ConHotspotShow_9 = 0, ConShow_10 = 0, ConHotspotShow_10 = 0, ConShow_11 = 0, ConHotspotShow_11 = 0, ConShow_12 = 0, ConHotspotShow_12 = 0, ConShow_13 = 0, ConHotspotShow_13 = 0, ConShow_14 = 0, ConHotspotShow_14 = 0, ConShow_15 = 0, ConHotspotShow_15 = 0, ConPosX_16=ConPosX_16, ConPosY_16=ConPosY_16, ConPosZ_16=ConPosZ_16, ConLength_16=ConLength_16, ConEdit_16 = 15, ConPosX_17=ConPosX_17, ConPosY_17=ConPosY_17, ConPosZ_17=ConPosZ_17, ConLength_17=ConLength_17, ConEdit_17 = 15, ConPosX_18=ConPosX_18-corrMEPx, ConPosY_18=ConPosY_18, ConPosZ_18=ConPosZ_18-corrMEPz, ConLength_18=ConLength_18, ConEdit_18 = 1, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData
if bWallmountedTap then del 1
del 1 endif ENDIF
! ============================================================================== ! Basin Streching/ 3D Hotspot Editing ! ==============================================================================
hotspot 0,0,h_top,unID : unID=unID + 1 + 3 ! needs +3, deleted old editable hotspot
hotspot 0,0,0,unID,h_top,1+128 : unID=unID+1 hotspot 0,0,-1,unID,h_top,3 : unID=unID+1 hotspot 0,0,h_top,unID,h_top,2 : unID=unID+1
addz h_top
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! Don't change the IDs of hotspots below. ! Mixed up to make it compatible between AC14 and AC15. ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! ---------- idNull = unID ! ---------- ! ---------- hotspot 0, 0, 0, idNull + 21, A2, 1 + 128, A ! ---------- hotspot -1, 0, 0, idNull + 2, A2, 3, A ! ---------- hotspot A2, 0, 0, idNull + 3, A2, 2, A ! ---------- ! ---------- hotspot 0, 0, 0, idNull + 22, A2, 1 + 128, A ! ---------- hotspot 1, 0, 0, idNull + 23, A2, 3, A ! ---------- hotspot -A2, 0, 0, idNull + 1, A2, 2, A ! ---------- ! ---------- ! ---------- hotspot 0, -B, 0, idNull + 24, A2, 1 + 128, A ! ---------- hotspot -1, -B, 0, idNull + 5, A2, 3, A ! ---------- hotspot A2, -B, 0, idNull + 6, A2, 2, A ! ---------- ! ---------- hotspot 0, -B, 0, idNull + 25, A2, 1 + 128, A ! ---------- hotspot 1, -B, 0, idNull + 26, A2, 3, A ! ---------- hotspot -A2, -B, 0, idNull + 4, A2, 2, A ! ---------- ! ---------- ! ---------- hotspot 0, 0, 0, idNull + 7, B, 1+128 ! ---------- hotspot 0, 1, 0, idNull + 8, B, 3 ! ---------- hotspot 0, -B, 0, idNull + 9, B, 2 ! ---------- ! ---------- hotspot -A/2, 0, 0, idNull + 10, B, 1+128 ! ---------- hotspot -A/2, 1, 0, idNull + 11, B, 3 ! ---------- hotspot -A/2, -B, 0, idNull + 12, B, 2 ! ---------- ! ---------- hotspot A/2, 0, 0, idNull + 13, B, 1+128 ! ---------- hotspot A/2, 1, 0, idNull + 14, B, 3 ! ---------- hotspot A/2, -B, 0, idNull + 15, B, 2 ! ---------- ! ---------- ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! Don't change the IDs of hotspots above. ! Mixed up to make it compatible between AC14 and AC15. ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
del 1
! ============================================================================== ! Basin 3D ! ==============================================================================
add -A/2, -B, h_top call "fa_basin_builtin" parameters all iBasinType = 3, sink_width = sink_width, backSplashThk = 0.02, gs_drain_mat = gs_tap_mat, basinbuiltin_unID = idNull + 27, returned_parameters unID del 1
end
Symbol.Script_2D:
!-----------2d--------------------- if show_el < EPS then end IF gs_detlevel_2D_m < EPS THEN END CALL "MEP_m_RequestSystemGlobals" PARAMETERS ALL one_ConID=0 returned_parameters gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, MEP_cline_type, MEP_cline_pen, show_el
! ============================================================================== ! Multi-Basin Counter ! ==============================================================================
unID = 1 hotspot2 0, 0,unID : unID = unID + 1 !! Default Hotspot
add2 -A/2, -B call "fa_basin_builtin" parameters all iBasinType = 3, sink_width = sink_width, backSplashThk = 0.02 del 1
unID = 20000 hotspot2 0, -B, unID, A2, 1+128, A : unID=unID+1 hotspot2 -1, -B, unID, A2, 3, A : unID=unID+1 hotspot2 A2, -B, unID, A2, 2, A : unID=unID+1
hotspot2 0, -B, unID, A2, 1+128, A : unID=unID+1 hotspot2 1, -B, unID, A2, 3, A : unID=unID+1 hotspot2 -A2, -B, unID, A2, 2, A : unID=unID+1
hotspot2 0, 0, unID, A2, 1+128, A : unID=unID+1 hotspot2 -1, 0, unID, A2, 3, A : unID=unID+1 hotspot2 A2, 0, unID, A2, 2, A : unID=unID+1
hotspot2 0, 0, unID, A2, 1+128, A : unID=unID+1 hotspot2 1, 0, unID, A2, 3, A : unID=unID+1 hotspot2 -A2, 0, unID, A2, 2, A : unID=unID+1
hotspot2 -A/2, 0, unID, B, 1+256, B : unID=unID+1 hotspot2 -A/2, 1, unID, B, 3, B : unID=unID+1 hotspot2 -A/2, -B, unID, B, 2, B : unID=unID+1
hotspot2 A/2, 0, unID, B, 1+256 : unID=unID+1 hotspot2 A/2, 1, unID, B, 3 : unID=unID+1 hotspot2 A/2, -B, unID, B, 2 : unID=unID+1
drawindex 10
add2 -A/2, -B call "fa_minimalspace" parameters all MSType = 1, unID = 3000 del 1
! ============================================================================== ! MEP ! ==============================================================================
if bShowMEP then
PEN gs_cont_pen
DrawingNum = 1
! --- CONNECTIONS to Basin #1 --- !
add2 -A/2 + sinkDistL + sink_width/2 + sinkPos[1][1], 0
if bWallmountedTap then ConEdit_1 = 12 ConEdit_2 = 12
corrMEPx = tapPos[1][1]
add2 corrMEPx, 0 else ConEdit_1 = 5 ConEdit_2 = 5
corrMEPx = 0 endif
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsACL_4" parameters SetProgram = SetProgram, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, DrawingNum = DrawingNum, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = ConEdit_1, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = ConEdit_1, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3-corrMEPx, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConEdit_3 = 0, ConShow_4 = 0, ConHotspotShow_4 = 0, ConShow_5 = 0, ConHotspotShow_5 = 0, ConShow_6 = 0, ConHotspotShow_6 = 0, ConShow_7 = 0, ConHotspotShow_7 = 0, ConShow_8 = 0, ConHotspotShow_8 = 0, ConShow_9 = 0, ConHotspotShow_9 = 0, ConShow_10 = 0, ConHotspotShow_10 = 0, ConShow_11 = 0, ConHotspotShow_11 = 0, ConShow_12 = 0, ConHotspotShow_12 = 0, ConShow_13 = 0, ConHotspotShow_13 = 0, ConShow_14 = 0, ConHotspotShow_14 = 0, ConShow_15 = 0, ConHotspotShow_15 = 0, ConShow_16 = 0, ConHotspotShow_16 = 0, ConShow_17 = 0, ConHotspotShow_17 = 0, ConShow_18 = 0, ConHotspotShow_18 = 0, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData
if bWallmountedTap then del 1 del 1
! --- CONNECTIONS to Basin #2 --- !
if nSink > 1 then add2 -A/2 + sinkDistL + sink_width*1.5 + sinkSpacing + sinkPos[2][1], 0
if bWallmountedTap then corrMEPx = tapPos[2][1] add2 corrMEPx, 0 else corrMEPx = 0 endif
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsACL_4" parameters SetProgram = SetProgram, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, DrawingNum = DrawingNum, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, ConShow_1 = 0, ConHotspotShow_1 = 0, ConShow_2 = 0, ConHotspotShow_2 = 0, ConShow_3 = 0, ConHotspotShow_3 = 0, ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4, ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4, ConLength_4=ConLength_4, ConEdit_4 = ConEdit_1, ConPosX_5=ConPosX_5, ConPosY_5=ConPosY_5, ConLength_5=ConLength_5, ConEdit_5 = ConEdit_2, ConPosX_6=ConPosX_6-corrMEPx, ConPosY_6=ConPosY_6, ConLength_6=ConLength_6, ConEdit_6 = 0, ConShow_7 = 0, ConHotspotShow_7 = 0, ConShow_8 = 0, ConHotspotShow_8 = 0, ConShow_9 = 0, ConHotspotShow_9 = 0, ConShow_10 = 0, ConHotspotShow_10 = 0, ConShow_11 = 0, ConHotspotShow_11 = 0, ConShow_12 = 0, ConHotspotShow_12 = 0, ConShow_13 = 0, ConHotspotShow_13 = 0, ConShow_14 = 0, ConHotspotShow_14 = 0, ConShow_15 = 0, ConHotspotShow_15 = 0, ConShow_16 = 0, ConHotspotShow_16 = 0, ConShow_17 = 0, ConHotspotShow_17 = 0, ConShow_18 = 0, ConHotspotShow_18 = 0, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData
